channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游 15:41 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerukh on Novopavlovka
item.description: 游 15:41 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerukh on Novopavlovka #m_nikopol_that_nikopol_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游 14:02 Free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291
item.description: 游 14:02 Free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291#Kupyansky_ region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
